title: Council Decision of 9 March 1999 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 9 March 1999 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency (1999/C 81/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular the second and third paragraphs of Article 54 thereof,
Having regard to Article X of the Statutes of the Euratom Supply Agency (1), as last amended by Decision 95/1/EC, Euratom, ECSC (2),
Having regard to the Council Decision of 27 June 1997 appointing the members of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency (3),
Having regard to the opinion of the Commission,
Whereas a member's seat on the aforementioned Committee has become vacant following the resignation of Mr Gรถran LAGERSTEDT, which was brought to the Council's attention on 4 August 1998;
Whereas this vacancy should be filled;
Having regard to the nomination submitted by the Swedish Government on 4 August 1998,
main_body: Mr Bengt OLOFSSON is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency for the remainder of the Committee's term of office, that is until 28 March 1999.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 March 1999.
For the Council
The President
W. RIESTER
(1) OJ 27, 6.12.1958, p. 534/58.
(2) OJ L 1, 1.1.1995, p. 1.
(3) OJ C 210, 11.7.1997, p. 3.
